verses.verse: Ask <WH7592> ye of Jehovah<WH3068> rain<WH4306> in the time<WH6256> of the latter rain<WH4456>, even of Jehovah<WH3068> that maketh<WH6213> lightnings<WH2385>; and he will give<WH5414> them showers<WH1653> of rain<WH4306>, to every one<WH376> grass<WH6212> in the field<WH7704>.

For the teraphim<WH8655> have spoken<WH1696> vanity<WH205>, and the diviners<WH7080> have seen<WH2372> a lie<WH8267>; and they have told<WH1696> false<WH7723> dreams<WH2472>, they comfort<WH5162> in vain<WH1892>: therefore they go<WH5265> their way like sheep<WH6629>, they are afflicted<WH6031>, because there is no shepherd<WH7462>.

Mine anger<WH639> is kindled<WH2734> against the shepherds<WH7462>, and I will punish<WH6485> the he-goats<WH6260>; for Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> hath visited<WH6485> his flock<WH5739>, the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063>, and will make<WH7760> them as his goodly<WH1935> horse<WH5483> in the battle<WH4421>.
From him shall come forth<WH3318> the corner-stone<WH6438>, from him the nail<WH3489>, from him the battle<WH4421> bow<WH7198>, from him every ruler<WH5065> together<WH3162>.

And they shall be as mighty<WH1368> men<WH947>, treading down their enemies in the mire<WH2916> of the streets<WH2351> in the battle<WH4421>; and they shall fight<WH3898>, because Jehovah<WH3068> is with them<WH7392>; and the riders on horses<WH5483> shall be confounded<WH3001>.

And I will strengthen<WH1396> the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063>, and I will save<WH3467> the house<WH1004> of Joseph<WH3130>, and I will bring them back<WH3427>; for I have mercy<WH7355> upon them<WH834>; and they shall be as though I had not cast them off<WH2186>: for I am Jehovah<WH3068> their God<WH430>, and I will hear them<WH6030>.

And they of Ephraim<WH669> shall be like a mighty<WH1368> man<WH3820>, and their heart shall rejoice<WH8055> as through wine<WH3196>; yea<WH1121>, their children shall see<WH7200> it<WH1523>, and rejoice; their heart<WH3820> shall be glad<WH8055> in Jehovah<WH3068>.
I will hiss<WH8319> for them<WH6908>, and gather them<WH6299>; for I have redeemed them<WH7235>; and they shall increase as they have increased<WH7235>.
And I will sow<WH2232> them among the peoples<WH5971>; and they shall remember<WH2142> me in far countries<WH4801>; and they shall live<WH2421> with their children<WH1121>, and shall return<WH7725>.

I will bring them again<WH7725> also out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, and gather<WH6908> them out of Assyria<WH804>; and I will bring<WH935> them into the land<WH776> of Gilead<WH1568> and Lebanon<WH3844>; and place shall not be found for them<WH4672>.

And he will pass through<WH5674> the sea<WH3220> of affliction<WH6869>, and will smite<WH5221> the waves<WH1530> in the sea<WH3220>, and all the depths<WH4688> of the Nile<WH2975> shall dry up<WH3001>; and the pride<WH1347> of Assyria<WH804> shall be brought down<WH3381>, and the sceptre<WH7626> of Egypt<WH4714> shall depart<WH5493>.
And I will strengthen<WH1396> them in Jehovah<WH3068>; and they shall walk up and down<WH1980> in his name<WH8034>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>.
